name: Poltimaster: Pandemic UK
description:
Poltimaster: Pandemic UK- The Game where you run the Country through a Pandemic, this Game is Short but you do make decisions based on COVID-19 and the Running of government. This is the First Instalment of the Poltimaster Series, please Feel free to share your Opinions and Comment! If this is liked then there will be more to come! This Game is only available for Windows At the Moment.

TheWindowsGuy
